content:
Based on our previous conversation, can you help me write the content for my introduction about Introduction (word count: 50)

Brief explanation of alternative dispute resolution (ADR)
Importance of ADR in legal disputes

For your reference, here is the old content to rewrite:
What’s the Difference between Mediation and Arbitration?
Sometimes it can be confusing which resolution between mediation and arbitration suits best for your problem. But first, what’s the difference between them? And which resolution can save you more time, effort, and money?

Please adjust the character count to 450 characters and 1 paragraph.
I intend to give you the next section so do not give a summary or conclusion yet.

Please respond to me in Australian English.
